turkish_example_sentence: O başarılı kariyerinin parlak yolunu uzun süre düşüne.
english_example_sentence: May he think about the bright path of his successful career for a long time.
russian_example_sentence: Пусть он долго думает о светлом пути своей успешной карьеры.
